Translations.Text: Sinaba bereye icabona mukuremwa kw’Amajuru n’Isi canke mukuremwa kw’imitima yabo, kandi sinagize abatakaza kuba abafasha banje

Umusi Imana izovuga iti:- nimu hamagare abafasha banje mubo mwavuze yuko aribo bafasha banje, nabo bazoba hamagara mugabo ntibazo bitaba natwe tuzoba shiriraho uruzitiro hagati yabo kugira ngo ntibabonane
N’abantu babi bazowubona umuriro udahera, kandi bazomenya yuko ari ngombwa kuribo kwinjira muri uwo muriro udahera, kandi ntibazoronka aho bawuhungira
Ntankeka twaraba menyesheje abantu muri ubu buryo n’ubundi buri muri iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu k’uburorero bwose, mugabo ikiremwa muntu cararengeje mubintu vyose kubijanye n’ibihari
Mugabo ntivyakingiye aba bantu kwemera mugihe bashikirwa Muremyi wabo kiretse bashikiwe nk’abaho hambere canke bashikirwe n’ibihano biri k’umugaragaro

Kandi ntituzana intumwa z’Imana atari uko baba bari mubatanzi b’inkuru nziza n’abatuza, nayo abahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri baraharira kubintu bidafise ukuri nakumwe atari kuri ivyo bintu kugira ngo bahindure ukuri, hanyuma bagira aya majambo yanje hamwe nivyo batujijwe kuba ari ibintu vy’ibijajuro

None ni nde muhemu mukuru gusumba uwibukiijwe amajambo y’Umuremyi wiwe nawe akaba atavyinezweho nukwibagira ivyabayeho kandi vyagizwe n’amaboko yiwe, twebwe twashize mumitima yabo imipfundikizo kugira ngo ntibatahure icarico cose no mumatwi yabo twashizeyo uburemere bw’ukutumva, rero ubahamagaye kubijanye n’uburokoke ntibemera kurokoka

N’Umuremyi wawe niwe nyene ikigongwe cinshi cane hamwe n’Impuhwe zihagije, kuko iyo ibahana kubera ibikorwa vyabo bagize, ntankeka yari kubaha ibihano vy’igihuti huti, mugabo abo bantu barafise indagano ry’ivyo batazo ronka ubuhungiro ubwaribwo bwose bw’uguheshanya nayo
N’ivyo bisagara twarabahoneje mugihe bahemukira imitima yabo, hanyuma tubashiriraho isango ry’uguhonywa kwabo

N’intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) mugihe yabwira umusore wiwe ati:- jewe nzobandanya gusa ngenda kugeza aho nzoshika kumahuriro y’ibiyaga bibiri, canke mbandanye ngenda ibinjana n’ibindi kugeza aho nzohura nuwo nshaka guhura nawe
Mugihe bashika bose uko ari babiri, ariho kumahwaniro y’ivyo biyaga uko ari bibiri, baribagiye impamba yabo ariyo fi, nawe aca yifatira inzira yiwe yukuja kukiyaga
Bamaze gushika imbere intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ibwira wamusore wiwe iti:- nuduhe ibifungurwa vyacu vyo mugitondo kuko urabona yuko turushe muri runo rugendo rwacu

Wamusore amwishura ati:- urabona harya hantu twaruhukiye kuri urya musozi, aho niho nibagiriye yafi yacu, kandi ntawundi yayinyibagije atari Shetani yatumye ndavyibagira, intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) aca abandanya urugendo rwiwe aja kukiyaga k’urugendo rw’igitangaza
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ivuga iti:- aha niho twashaka gushika, baca basubira inyuma bakurikira inzira yabo
Baca basanga umwe mubashumvyi bacu twahaye imigisha ivuye kuri twebwe nuwo twigishije nuguha ubumenyi bwinshi buvuye kuri twebwe
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ibwira wa musore iti:- mbega ndagukurikire kugira ngo unyigishe ibiri muri bwaburongozi wigishijwe
Nawe amwishura ati:- mu vy’ukuri wewe ntushobora kwihangana kuba hamwe nanje
Mbega ushobora kwihangana gute kubintu utazi ukuri kwavyo
Nawe yishura ati:- Imana ibishatse uzombona ndimu bantu bihangana, kandi sinzohakana itegeko ryawe
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) imubwira iti:- niwa nkurikira ntusubire kumbaza icarico cose kugeza aho jewe nzotangura kubi kumenyesha
Uko ari babiri baciye bagenda kugeza aho burira ubwato, aca arabu tobora, wamusore aca avuga ati:- mbega utoboye ubu bwato kugira ngo wibize abari muribwo? Mu vy’ukuri ugize icaha kibi cane
Nawe aca avuga ati:- sinakubwiye yuko wewe udashobora kwihangana kuba hamwe nanje
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) avuga ati:- ntunteko umwikomo kubijanye n’ukwibagira kwanje, kandi ntungirire umukazo wacane kubijanye n’ibi bintu vyanje vy’ugukurikirana na wewe

Bose uko ari babiri baraba ndanya urugendo rwabo kugeza aho bahura n’umusore akiri mutoyi aca aramu gandagura, intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) aca avuga ati:- wishe umuntu atagicumuro nawe atishe umuntu, ntankeka ugize ikintu kibi cane
